<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type UnionReplace<T, U extends [any, any][]> = U extends [
    infer F,
    ...infer RT extends [any, any][]
] ? F extends [infer ToBeReplaced, infer Replacer] ? UnionReplace<Exclude<T, ToBeReplaced> | Replacer, RT> : UnionReplace<T, RT> : T;
```
